de.iss.mv2.security

Class CertificateVerificationResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.iss.mv2.security.CertificateVerificationResult

  • public class CertificateVerificationResult
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the result of a certificate verification.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.Throwable exception
      May contains an exception that failed the verification.
      private java.security.cert.PKIXCertPathBuilderResult result
      Contains the path builder result.
      private boolean valid
      Indicates if the certificate was valid.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CertificateVerificationResult(java.security.cert.PKIXCertPathBuilderResult result)
      Constructs a certificate verification result for valid certificate by given certification path.
      CertificateVerificationResult(java.lang.Throwable exception)
      Constructs a certificate verification result for invalid certificate by given exception that keeps the problem occurred during the verification process.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Throwable getException()
      Returns the exception that failed the verification.
      java.security.cert.PKIXCertPathBuilderResult getResult()
      Returns the path builder result.
      boolean isValid()
      Returns the result of the verification.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CertificateVerificationResult

        public CertificateVerificationResult(java.security.cert.PKIXCertPathBuilderResult result)
        Constructs a certificate verification result for valid certificate by given certification path.
        Parameters:
        result - The path builder result.

      • CertificateVerificationResult

        public CertificateVerificationResult(java.lang.Throwable exception)
        Constructs a certificate verification result for invalid certificate by given exception that keeps the problem occurred during the verification process.
        Parameters:
        exception - The exception that failed the verification.

    • Method Detail

      • isValid

        public boolean isValid()
        Returns the result of the verification.
        Returns:
        true, if the certificate seems to be valid.

      • getResult

        public java.security.cert.PKIXCertPathBuilderResult getResult()
        Returns the path builder result.
        Returns:
        The path builder result.

      • getException

        public java.lang.Throwable getException()
        Returns the exception that failed the verification.
        Returns:
        The exception that failed the verification or null if no exception was thrown.
